mn.gloss: a hard brittle grey polyvalent metallic element that resembles iron but is not magnetic

mniaceae.gloss: family of erect mosses with club-shaped paraphyses and the hexagonal cells of the upper leaf surface

mnium.gloss: mosses similar to those of genus Bryum but larger

mnemonic.gloss: of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory

mnemotechnic.gloss: of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory

mnemotechnical.gloss: of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory
